question: What is the past tense of 'go'?
Identify the noun in: 'The beautiful flower bloomed.'
What type of sentence is: 'What time is it?'
Choose the correct form: 'She _____ to school every day.'
What is a synonym for 'happy'?
Which is the correct spelling?
What is the plural of 'child'?
Identify the verb in: 'The cat sleeps on the mat.'
Choose the correct article: 'I saw ___ apple.'
What is the antonym of 'hot'?
Choose the correctly capitalized sentence.
Fill in the blank: 'She is _____ than her brother.'
Fill in the blank: '_____ are my books.'
Choose the past tense: 'They _____ soccer yesterday.'
Subject-verb agreement: 'Neither of the boys _____ late.'
Choose the correct preposition: 'He sat _____ the chair.'
Choose the correct word: 'They went to _____ house.'
Choose the correct punctuation: 'Yes I can help'.
Identify the adjective in: 'The tall tree swayed.'
Which is the correct spelling?
Fill in the blank: 'If I _____ time, I will call you.'
Change to passive voice: 'They built the bridge.'
options: The bridge was built by them.
The bridge is built by them.
The bridge has built by them.
The bridge will built by them.
answer: The bridge was built by them.

question: Choose the correct reported speech: He said, 'I am tired.'
options: He said that he was tired.
He said that I was tired.
He says that he was tired.
He said that he is tired.
answer: He said that he was tired.

question: Identify the clause type in: 'I left because I was late.' (because I was late)
Fill in the blank: 'If I _____ you, I would study more.'
Choose the correct subjunctive: 'It is essential that he _____ on time.'
Choose the sentence with correct parallel structure.
options: She likes running, to swim, and biking.
She likes to run, to swim, and to bike.
She likes to run, swimming, and to bike.
She likes running, swim, and bike.
answer: She likes to run, to swim, and to bike.

question: Choose the correct punctuation: 'I finished my work I went home.'
options: I finished my work; I went home.
I finished my work, I went home.
I finished my work: I went home.
I finished my work. And went home.
answer: I finished my work; I went home.

question: Choose the sentence without a dangling modifier.
options: Walking down the street, the trees were beautiful.
Walking down the street, I saw beautiful trees.
I saw walking down the street, beautiful trees.
Walking down the street beautiful trees I saw.
answer: Walking down the street, I saw beautiful trees.

question: Identify the figure of speech: 'He is as brave as a lion.'

Subject-verb agreement: 'The team _____ winning this season.'
Fill in the blank: 'To _____ did you speak?'
Choose the correct tense: 'By next year, they _____ the project.'
Fill in the blank: 'If she had seen the sign, she _____.'
